0.title: Unused DoubleTapJump
0.desc: An unused setting in the game that allows you to perform a "jump". This doesn't fit the game at all, so it was a very interesting find.

1.title: Self Boombox
1.desc: In this game, a term used to refer to vacuuming up coins that are created from a coin box is called "Boomboxing", this video guarantees this happens every item box.

2.title: Sky Garden Soaring
2.desc: Flying around a track instead of driving it by setting the kart to always be in the gliding state.

3.title: Red Heart - Custom Special Item
3.desc: A custom special item using the existing heart item as a base.

4.title: Leftover Roads in Vancouver Velocity
4.desc: Driving on roads that had not been used in a variant of the Vancouver Velocity track. Created when only 2 of the versions were released.

5.title: Singapore Sidestreets - Unused Road Exploration
5.desc: Another unused road exploration, created when only the first part of the Singapore track was released.

6.title: Unused Boo Item Functionality
6.desc: Demonstration of some unused variables related to an unused Boo item in Mario Kart Tour.

7.title: Myth: Are Red Coins Overwritten?
7.desc: An empirical test of if event coins overwrite red coins in a coin box.
